movies.title: If the Seed Doesn't Die
movies.plot: Two fathers, a Romanian searching for his daughter who was forced into prostitution in Kosovo, and a Serbian seeking the body of his son killed in a car accident in Romania, meet on the river Danube. A boatman recounts the 200 year-old legend of Romanian peasants struggling unsuccessfully to move an old wooden church up the hill to their village at a time when building Orthodox churches was prohibited.
movies.simplePlot: Two fathers, a Romanian searching for his daughter who was forced into prostitution in Kosovo, and a Serbian seeking the body of his son killed in a car accident in Romania, meet on the ...

biography.bio: Ioana Barbu is an actress, known for Love Sick (2006), The Zero Theorem (2013) and If the Seed Doesn't Die (2010).
biography.name: Ioana Barbu

biography.bio: Alexandru Bindea was born on June 22, 1957 in Bucharest, Romania. He is an actor, known for Au diable Staline, vive les mariés! (2008), Aferim! (2015) and Maria (2003).
biography.name: Alexandru Bindea

biography.bio: Franz Buchrieser was born on December 26, 1937 in Graz, Austria. He is an actor, known for Le principe de l'Arche de Noé (1984), Julia - Eine ungewöhnliche Frau (1999) and Der Skipper (1990).
biography.name: Franz Buchrieser

biography.bio: Dan Condurache was born on July 26, 1952 in Dorohoi, Romania. He is an actor, known for Everyday God Kisses Us on the Mouth (2001), Au diable Staline, vive les mariés! (2008) and De ce eu? (2015).
biography.name: Dan Condurache

biography.bio: Bryan Jardine is an actor, known for Toni Erdmann (2016), Seule contre tous (2010) and Callas Forever (2002).
biography.name: Bryan Jardine

biography.bio: Horatiu Malaele is a Romanian actor and film director born on August 1st 1952 in Targu-Jiu. He graduated the Theater and Cinematography Art Institute in the year 1975. Horatiu Malaele became renowned for his theater plays, which he directed, but also for his characters in Romanian comedy movies. Through his career, he won several awards for his parts in movies like "Tinerete fara batranete", "Sluga la doi stapan", "Muntele", "Eulenspiegel" etc. Beside his movies and theater plays, Horatiu Malaele took up writing with his auto-biography book "Horatiu despre Malaele" and later, in 2012, publishing the novel "Rataciri" (Wanders).
biography.name: Horatiu Malaele

biography.placeOfBirth: Banja Luka, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Yugoslavia
biography.bio: Mustafa Nadarevic was born on May 2, 1943 in Banja Luka, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for Lud, zbunjen, normalan (2007), No Man's Land (2001) and The Perfect Circle (1997).
biography.name: Mustafa Nadarevic

biography.bio: Milenko Pavlov was born on April 8, 1950 in Srpska Crnja, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor and writer, known for Agencija za SiS (2006), Pastrovski vitez (1982) and Mister Dolar (1989).
biography.name: Milenko Pavlov

biography.bio: Relu Poalelungi was born on May 30, 1977. He is an actor, known for Assassination Games (2011), If the Seed Doesn't Die (2010) and Camelia (2010).
biography.name: Relu Poalelungi

biography.bio: Goran Radakovic was born on July 11, 1964 in Belgrade, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor and producer, known for Sindjelici (2013), Three Palms for Two Punks and a Babe (1998) and Strawberries in the Supermarket (2003). He is married to Dubravka Mijatovic.
biography.name: Goran Radakovic

biography.bio: Simona Stoicescu is an actress, known for 4 Months, 3 Weeks and 2 Days (2007), Au diable Staline, vive les mariés! (2008) and If the Seed Doesn't Die (2010).
biography.name: Simona Stoicescu

biography.bio: Milos Tanaskovic was born in Belgrade on March 25th 1982. After high school graduation he proudly sailed into acting hoping to achieve the greatness of his idols Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Edward Norton and Kevin Spacey. He started acting back in 1994. in school plays but in 2002. he enlisted in the Faculty of Dramatic Arts and has acted in several student films and plays. His first feature movie was Ljubav Ane Morave (The Love of Ana Morava) that was never finished. A stroke of bad luck that would vacillate many, but Milos continued acting and now is one of the rising stars of Shaitan's Warrior(Sejtanov Ratnik). He, also, finds theater more accommodating than film. Says it is more real, more natural. Has two favorite hobbies: is a fan of football club Arsenal; and often goes for a quick drink with his colleagues: Radovan Vujovic, Marko Mrdjenovic, Vujadin Milosevic, Mrs. Koprivica and her charming but sinful companion Stevan Filipovic.
biography.name: Milos Tanaskovic

biography.bio: Valentin Teodosiu was born on September 17, 1953 in Romania. He is an actor, known for Au diable Staline, vive les mariés! (2008), Assassination Games (2011) and Gadjo dilo (1997).
biography.name: Valentin Teodosiu

categories.category: Best Actress In A Supporting Role
